ADDWII 空氣地圖 知識庫 關於APP Air quality is normal, please keep it fresh. TVOC is low, no irritation or discomfort risk. The air quality is slightly polluted. Avoid staying in this situation too long (12 months). Improved ventilation is recommended. The air quality is poor. Avoid staying in this situation too long (1 month). Intensified ventilation is recommended. The air quality is unhealthy. Avoid staying in this situation too long (Within hours). Intensified ventilation is necessary. The air quality is very unhealthy. Please leave here. Intensified ventilation is mandatory. The air quality is hazardous. Please leave here immediately. Intensified ventilation is mandatory. Normally, Human feels cool and comfortable when the humidity percent range is about 45%~65%. Your body healthy cannot be afforded by too dry or too moist. Normally, the best temperature for human is about 18~25℃(64~77°F)
Normal Moderate High Unhealthy Very Unhealthy Hazardous The air quality is normal. The air quality is moderate. You may feel uncomfortable. Improved ventilation is recommended. The air quality is poor. Avoid staying in this situation too long. Intensified ventilation is recommended. The air quality is unhealthy. Avoid staying in this situation too long. Intensified ventilation is necessary. The air quality is very unhealthy. Please leave here. Intensified ventilation is mandatory. The air quality is hazardous. Please leave here immediately. Intensified ventilation is mandatory.

Access to the location service is required to demonstrate the \'my location\' feature, which shows your current location on the map. This sample requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Google Maps API Demos\'. Location permission is required for this demo.
